name: Queen Beauty Makeover
description:
This game has some different from the old salon games, you will get a new fresh feeling and real life feeling in it. Give your model a relax and nice back spa, then facial salon, makeup her and dress up her with so many nice and colorful items.
Look at so many nice and colorful makeups and dresses, won't you want to try them? You will get more fun from it.
In this game you're a beauty expert. In your salon has got 3 type selection. First Facial and Spa, second makeover salon, third dress up shop. You will get a customer and you will apply all selection for the customer. You must give your customer a stunning beauty makeover.
Let’s play a fun dress and makeup game just for girls!
Features :
- Dress princesses in beautiful outfits and jewelry.
- Massage professionally like in Spa
- Help beauty girl with a face salon.
- Professional haircuts and caring
- Use series of best cosmetics to makeup.
- Create your own colorful manicure
- Apply cream on face.
- Chose dresses and shoes.

Finish the game with your perfect and a beautiful face and skin, colorful manicure and dress up in best fashion styles.
Enjoy now!
